quote: Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: A thing worth having is a thing worth cheating for.
author: W.C. Fields

quote: A dishonest man you can always trust to be dishonest.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: The moment you cheat for the sake of beauty, you know you're an artist.
author: David Hockney

quote: People generally didn't cheat in good relationships.
author: Emily Giffin,  Something Blue

quote: When I consider life, it is all a cheat. Yet fooled with hope, people favor this deceit.
author: John Dryden

quote: He said, speaking more to himself than to me: 'It was knowledge I sought. Knowledge which is clean and pure, far above the cheating and deceiving in which most men spend their lives.'And do you not find it,' I asked, 'this knowledge which you prize?'In part,' he said. 'I find other things, too. Things I do not desire but must accept. There is still cheating and deceiving.
author: John Christopher,  Beyond the Burning Lands

quote: Neither love nor evil conquers all, but evil cheats more.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Cerulean Sins

quote: Deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Cheaters never prosper. (Because they suck.)
author: Greg Behrendt

quote: I write out of revenge.
author: William Goldman

quote: Trust your gut feelings.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I’ve never cheated on a lover. I’m faithful, always. But the war comes before anyone’s feelings. Every time.”Wow. Battle before love. Without a doubt, he was the most unromantic male she’d ever met. Even more so than her great-grandfather, who had laughingly burned her great-grandmother to death after she’d given birth to Gwen’s grandmother.
author: Gena Showalter,  The Darkest Whisper

quote: Cunning is the art of concealing our own defects, and discovering other people's weaknesses.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Statistically speaking, there is a 65 percent chance that the love of your life is having an affair. Be very suspicious.
author: Scott Dikkers,  You Are Worthless: Depressing Nuggets of Wisdom Sure to Ruin Your Day

quote: No. No, I don't believe you'd betray me with her. I don't believe you'd cheat on me. But I'm afraid, and I'm sick in my heart that you might look at her, then at me. And regret.
author: J.D. Robb,  Innocent in Death

quote: Not doing harder than doing.
author: Natalie Wright,  Emily's House

quote: 'Mistresses' is about the lives of four women, each going through different versions of infidelity. Their longtime friendship is what gets them through extremely challenging times.
author: Rochelle Aytes

quote: Don't mistake activity with achievement.
author: John Wooden

quote: Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship’s poison.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: A gun. I had been brought down by a gun. It was practically comical. Cheaters, I thought.
author: Richelle Mead,  Last Sacrifice

quote: You think I'd cheat on you?"I demanded with all the innocent outrage I could muster."With another guy, no. With a cheeseburger . . . in a heartbeat.
author: Lisa Kleypas,  Smooth Talking Stranger

quote: Honesty may be the best policy, but it's important to remember that apparently, by elimination, dishonesty is the second-best policy.
author: George Carlin

quote: Selling something only to steal it back to sell again is not only dishonest, but highly profitable.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: When I try, I fail. When I trust, He succeeds.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: About adultery: Don’t go looking for pancakes when you have flapjacks at home.
author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..

quote: Your intuition knows what to write, so get out of the way.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Just pick a goal and stick to it―no big complicated secret.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: Using the Backdoor If we compare writing computer code to sex,then hacking would be anal sex.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I told him I was going to betray you, and betray Lyra, and he believed me because I was corrupt and full of wickedness; he looked so deep I felt sure he'd see the truth. But I lied too well. I was lying with every nerve and fiber and everything I'd ever done...I wanted him to find no good in me, and he didn't. There is none.
author: Philip Pullman,  The Amber Spyglass

quote: For there to be betrayal, there would have to have been trust first.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: To find out if she really loved me, I hooked her up to a lie detector. And just as I suspected, my machine was broken.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.

quote: A love affair with knowledge will never end in heartbreak.
author: Michael Marino

quote: The most complicated skill is to be simple.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Having perfected our disguise, we spend our lives searching for someone we don’t fool.
author: Robert Brault

quote: You can’t put much on paper before you betray your secret self, try as you will to keep things civil.
author: Patricia Hampl,  I Could Tell You Stories: Sojourns in the Land of Memory

quote: Husbands are chiefly good as lovers when they are betraying their wives.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Betrayal is an ironic thing. He or she betrays you then you betray yourself. You think you’re showing strength with your anger, but in reality you’re showing how much you still care.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: I never made a mistake in my life; at least, never one that I couldn't explain away afterwards.
author: Rudyard Kipling,  Under The Deodars

quote: It is necessary to the happiness of man that he be mentally faithful to himself. Infidelity does not consist in believing, or in disbelieving, it consists in professing to believe what he does not believe.
author: Thomas Paine,  The Age of Reason

quote: Bad books on writing tell you to "WRITE WHAT YOU KNOW", a solemn and totally false adage that is the reason there exist so many mediocre novels about English professors contemplating adultery.
author: Joe Haldeman

quote: The only faithfulness people have is to emotions they're trying to recapture
author: Norman Mailer

quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
author: Andre Gide

quote: I wanted to figure out why I was so busy, but I couldn't find the time to do it.
author: Todd Stocker

quote: The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: You can spend minutes, hours, days, weeks, or even months over-analyzing a situation; trying to put the pieces together, justifying what could've, would've happened... or you can just leave the pieces on the floor and move the fuck on.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: We learned about honesty and integrity - that the truth matters... that you don't take shortcuts or play by your own set of rules... and success doesn't count unless you earn it fair and square.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Making excuses is one of a host of self-defeating behaviours and mental patterns that can block your success.
author: Stephen Richards,  The Ultimate Focus Builder

quote: When a person is punished for their honesty they begin to learn to lie.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: You don't know what you can get away with until you try.
author: Colin Powell
